title: What Trump Camp, Putin, Zelensky Said After Biden's Missile Nod For Ukraine
content: The Biden administration has made a significant policy change, allowing Ukraine to use US-made ATACMS missiles to strike targets inside Russia for the first time.
summary: The Biden administration has made a significant policy change, allowing Ukraine to use US-made ATACMS missiles to strike targets inside Russia for the first time.

title: "Trump's Return Will Not Impact Iran-China Ties": Ayatollah Khamenei's Aide
content: Iran's ties with China will remain unchanged despite the election of Donald Trump as US president, an adviser to Iran's supreme leader said.
summary: Iran's ties with China will remain unchanged despite the election of Donald Trump as US president, an adviser to Iran's supreme leader said.

title: After A Meteoric Rise, Artificial Intelligence Progress Now Slowing Down?
content: A quietly growing belief in Silicon Valley could have immense implications: the breakthroughs from large AI models -- the ones expected to bring human-level artificial intelligence in the near future -- may be slowing down.
summary: A quietly growing belief in Silicon Valley could have immense implications: the breakthroughs from large AI models -- the ones expected to bring human-level artificial intelligence in the near future -- may be slowing down.

title: Opinion: The Pakistan-China Friendship Is Fast Turning Sour
content: A string of bombings targeting Chinese nationals have angered Beijing, which has pushed Pakistan to begin formal negotiations for a joint security management system.
summary: A string of bombings targeting Chinese nationals have angered Beijing, which has pushed Pakistan to begin formal negotiations for a joint security management system.

title: China's 'Peace Call' For Ukraine After US Okays Strikes On Russia
content: China reiterated calls for a peaceful settlement to the war in Ukraine, after Washington cleared Kyiv to use long-range American missiles against military targets inside Russia.
summary: China reiterated calls for a peaceful settlement to the war in Ukraine, after Washington cleared Kyiv to use long-range American missiles against military targets inside Russia.

title: Joe Biden Risking World War III With Missile Decision: Russian Lawmakers
content: Russian lawmaker Maria Butina said on Monday that the administration of President Joe Biden was risking World War Three if it had allowed Ukraine to use US-made weapons to strike deep into Russia.
summary: Russian lawmaker Maria Butina said on Monday that the administration of President Joe Biden was risking World War Three if it had allowed Ukraine to use US-made weapons to strike deep into Russia.

title: After Imsha Rehman, Pak Influencer Mathira's Private Videos Leaked Online
content: A private video of Pakistani TV host and influencer Mathira Mohammad was leaked on social media recently, adding to the series of similar controversies.
summary: A private video of Pakistani TV host and influencer Mathira Mohammad was leaked on social media recently, adding to the series of similar controversies.

title: Indian-Origin CEO Got "Death Threats" Over His "No Work-Life Balance" Post
content: Daksh Gupta shared that employees at Greptile typically worked from 9 am to 11 pm or later, with Saturdays being regular workdays and occasional work on Sundays.
summary: Daksh Gupta shared that employees at Greptile typically worked from 9 am to 11 pm or later, with Saturdays being regular workdays and occasional work on Sundays.

title: UK PM Starmer To Seek 'Pragmatic' Chinese Ties In Meeting With Xi Jinping
content: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer will seek to build a "pragmatic" relationship with China that is "rooted in the UK's national interests" when he meets President Xi Jinping on the sidelines of the G20 summit in Brazil on Monday.
summary: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer will seek to build a "pragmatic" relationship with China that is "rooted in the UK's national interests" when he meets President Xi Jinping on the sidelines of the G20 summit in Brazil on Monday.

title: Masked Men Break Into UK's Windsor Castle Estate, Steal Vehicles: Report
content: Two masked men broke into Britain's royal Windsor Castle estate last month and stole two vehicles from a barn, the Sun newspaper reported on Monday.
summary: Two masked men broke into Britain's royal Windsor Castle estate last month and stole two vehicles from a barn, the Sun newspaper reported on Monday.

title: Who Is New Zealand's MP Whose Traditional Maori Dance Video Went Viral
content: A young New Zealand parliamentarian tore a copy of the controversial Indigenous Treaty Principles Bill on the floor of the house and then performed the traditional Maori war dance, the haka.
summary: A young New Zealand parliamentarian tore a copy of the controversial Indigenous Treaty Principles Bill on the floor of the house and then performed the traditional Maori war dance, the haka.

title: Developing Countries More Vulnerable To Antimicrobial Resistance: WHO
content: Developing countries are more vulnerable to antimicrobial resistance -- a global health concern affecting the effectiveness of life-saving medicines and management of infectious diseases worldwide, said WHO Regional Director for South-East Asia.
summary: Developing countries are more vulnerable to antimicrobial resistance -- a global health concern affecting the effectiveness of life-saving medicines and management of infectious diseases worldwide, said WHO Regional Director for South-East Asia.

title: What Visitors Get To Do At 'Coffin Cafe' At Japan Funeral Home
content: A funeral home in Japan has introduced a unique "coffin cafe", allowing visitors to lie in caskets and reflect on life and death.
summary: A funeral home in Japan has introduced a unique "coffin cafe", allowing visitors to lie in caskets and reflect on life and death.

title: Work From Home Has Substantial Benefits But Lacks Effective Communication: Report
content: Work from Home (WFH) is beneficial in terms of saving on rentals, reduced commuting stress and increased efficiency for employees and but it is detrimental to effective communication and Teamwork says a report.
summary: Work from Home (WFH) is beneficial in terms of saving on rentals, reduced commuting stress and increased efficiency for employees and but it is detrimental to effective communication and Teamwork says a report.

title: Mystery Surrounds Alligator Found In Suburban New York Waterway
content: An alligator was found in a creek in Rockland County, New York, sparking widespread confusion and curiosity about how it ended up there.
summary: An alligator was found in a creek in Rockland County, New York, sparking widespread confusion and curiosity about how it ended up there.

title: 'Terrible' AI Has Given Tech An Existential Headache: Activist
content: "Then the moment they got an opportunity, with AI, to increase shareholder returns... every single one of them slammed the red button," climate activist Sage Lenier said.

title: "This Is Anubis": Apollo The Dog Is Viral After Climbing Giza Pyramid
content: The viral footage, captured by American paragliding enthusiast Alex Lang and shared online by his friend Marshall Mosher, showed Apollo - the dog - fearlessly climbing the 136-metre monument.
summary: The viral footage, captured by American paragliding enthusiast Alex Lang and shared online by his friend Marshall Mosher, showed Apollo - the dog - fearlessly climbing the 136-metre monument.

title: Airbus A321XLR: The Fuel-Efficient, Single-Aisle, Long-Range Aircraft
content: The A321XLR, standing for "Xtra Long Range," is the longest-range commercial aircraft in its class, capable of flying up to 8,700 km.
summary: The A321XLR, standing for "Xtra Long Range," is the longest-range commercial aircraft in its class, capable of flying up to 8,700 km.

title: G20 Leaders To Discuss Climate, Tax, Donald Trump's Comeback In Brazil
content: G20 leaders gather in Brazil on Monday to discuss fighting poverty, boosting climate financing and other multilateral initiatives that could yet be upended by Donald Trump's impending return to the White House.

title: Opinion: How PM Modi Transformed India-Africa Engagement
content: Indias relationship with African nations has deep roots, but despite decades of diplomatic rhetoric, these ties often remained lukewarm. To Modis credit, he has revitalised India-Africa relations, making them a priority.
summary: Indias relationship with African nations has deep roots, but despite decades of diplomatic rhetoric, these ties often remained lukewarm. To Modis credit, he has revitalised India-Africa relations, making them a priority.
